articles.title: Verizon Wireless Customers Report Outages Across US - CNET
articles.description: Restarting phones appears to restore the ability to make and receive calls.
articles.content:
Verizon wireless customers across the US reported they were unable to make or receive phone calls Wednesday afternoon.

articles.title: Nasdaq drops as Netflix subscriber numbers weigh on tech - Reuters
articles.description: The tech-heavy Nasdaq dropped on Wednesday as Netflix's surprise decline in subscribers weighed on both the streaming giant and other high-growth companies, which investors feared may face similar post-pandemic performance issues.
